com.clusterpoint.api.request

Class CPSSearchRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clusterpoint.api.CPSRequest
      • com.clusterpoint.api.request.CPSSearchRequest

  • public class CPSSearchRequest
extends CPSRequest
    The CPSSearchRequest class is a wrapper for the CPSRequest class
    See Also:

      • CPSSearchRequest

        public CPSSearchRequest(java.lang.String query,
                        int offset,
                        int docs)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs an instance of the CPSSearchRequest class.
        Parameters:
        query - The query string. see setQuery for more info.
        offset - Defines the number of documents to skip before including them in the results
        docs - Maximum document count to retrieve
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • CPSSearchRequest

        public CPSSearchRequest(java.lang.String query,
                        int offset,
                        int docs,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> list)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs an instance of the CPSSearchRequest class.
        Parameters:
        query - The query string. see setQuery for more info.
        offset - Defines the number of documents to skip before including them in the results
        docs - Maximum document count to retrieve
        list - map where key is xpath and value contains listing options (yes, no, snippet or highlight)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(java.lang.String query)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the search query. Example usage: r.setQuery(CPSTerm.getString("predefined_term", "/generated_fields/type/"));
        Parameters:
        query - The query string. All <, > and & characters that aren't supposed to be XML tags, should be escaped (e.g. with CPSTerm);
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        CPSTerm
